schema.title: Brief Pain Inventory
schema.description: Rapidly assesses the severity of pain and its impact on functioning

BPIPainWorst.title: Select the one number that best describes your pain at its WORST in the last 7 days, from no pain (0) to the worst possible pain (10)

BPIPainLeast.title: Select the one number that best describes your pain at its LEAST in the last 7 days

BPIPainAverage.title: Select the one number that best describes your pain on AVERAGE in the last 7 days

BPIPainNow.title: Select the one number that best describes your pain RIGHT NOW

BPIGeneralActivity.title: Select the one number that describes how, during the past 7 days, pain has interfered with your general activity

BPIMood.title: Select the one number that describes how, during the past 7 days, pain has interfered with your mood

BPIWalking.title: Select the one number that describes how, during the past 7 days, pain has interfered with your walking ability

BPIWork.title: Select the one number that describes how, during the past 7 days, pain has interfered with your normal work (includes both work outside the home and housework)

BPIRelations.title: Select the number that describes how, during the past 7 days, pain has interfered with your relations with other people

BPISleep.title: Select the number that describes how, during the past 7 days, pain has interfered with your sleep

BPIEnjoyment.title: Select the number that describes how, during the past 7 days, pain has interfered with your enjoyment of life
